gurudev.name:
Param Pujya Shri Swami
Harichaitanyanand Saraswatiji Maharaj
gurudev.description: Founder and spiritual guide of Shri Gurudev Ashram (Palaskhed Sapkal, Chikhli, Buldhana) and Swami Harichaitanya Shanti Ashram Trust (Datala, Malkapur)
gurudev.about1: Gurudev ji showed the path of living with bhakti, gyan and selfless seva together. Through daily satsang, Gita path, Haripath, annadan, education, medical, gaushala, gurukulam, adivasi seva, anath ashram and Seva Tirth Dham, service is rendered to society at the ashram.
gurudev.about2: The purpose of every seva work is to purify the mind and uplift society. Branches and services inspired by Gurudev ji connect devotees across different parts of the country.
gurudev.teaching1Content: Satsang filled with bhakti ras, study of Shrimad Bhagavad Gita and selfless service are considered one sadhana.
gurudev.teaching2Content: Making Haripath, Gita path and Namasmaran part of daily routine stabilizes the mind.
gurudev.teaching3Content: Serving society through annadan, gurukul, anath ashram, gaushala and medical seva is atma seva.
gurudev.timingsNote: Timings may be changed on special occasions.

step2.enterValidEmail: Enter a valid email to verify

step2.panLengthInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-character PAN number

step4.paymentNote: You will be redirected to Razorpay's secure payment gateway to complete your donation. All payment methods (UPI, Cards, Net Banking, Wallets) are supported.
step4.secureNote: Your payment is secure and encrypted. We use Razorpay for secure payment processing.
step4.cancelled: Payment cancelled. You can try again.
step4.selectCauseFirst: Please select a donation cause before proceeding
step4.razorpaySdkError: Razorpay SDK not loaded. Please refresh the page and try again.

step5.thankYou: Thank you for your generous contribution

step5.receiptSentEmail: Receipt will be sent to your verified email
step5.emailNotVerifiedNote: Verify your email in future donations to receive receipts automatically.
step5.blessingMessage:
Thank you for your generous contribution.
May you be blessed with peace, prosperity, and spiritual growth!
step5.refundNote: If money was deducted, it will be refunded within 5-7 business days.
step5.doNotClose: Please do not close this page. We are confirming your payment.
step5.receiptNotReady: Receipt not available yet. Please try again later.
